meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Trevor Bryan Michelle LaLonde Judy Nichols Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6356.

td.p: Trevor Bryan, an academic advisor from Tallahassee, Florida
Michelle LaLonde, a law librarian from Novi, Michigan
Judy Nichols, a mystery writer from Wilmington, North Carolina (whose 2-day cash winnings total $46,500)

tr.td: THE ELIZABETHAN ERA
IT'S USEFUL IN THE KITCHEN
2 Zs, PLEASE
BEHIND THE SONGS
WORDS ON A FACEBOOK PAGE
"THE" NOVEL
(Alex: Each correct response will be The followed by a single word.)

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'In 1599 a syndicate headed by actor Richard Burbage built this theatre')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: In 1599 a syndicate headed by actor Richard Burbage built this theatre

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [To Michelle] You are, of course, correct. He\'s been doing Mark Twain for half a century.)
[Judy\'s response was not accepted as she did not cross out "Samuel".]
MichelleWho is Hal Holbrook?
$7,900
JudyWho is Samuel Clemons Hal Holbrook?
$10,000
TrevorWho is Harry
$8,000
Hal Holbrook')
